4 Stress Area, in.” = 0.7854 [D — 0.9743/ n] 2 where D = nominal diameter, in., and n = threads/in. a
® Based on 125 000 psi for sizes 1% to 21% in., inclusive, and on 115 000 psi for sizes over 21% to 4 in., inclusive. .
© Based on 105 000 psi for sizes % to 21% in., inclusive, and on 95 000 psi for sizes over 21% to 4 in., inclusive.
P Based on 109 000 psi for sizes 1% to 2% in., inclusive, and on 99 000 psi for sizes over 21% to 4 in., inclusive.
£ Based on 150 000 psi for sizes % to 21 in., inclusive, and on 140 000 psi for sizes over 2% to 4 in., inclusive. .
F Based on 120 000 psi for sizes 1/4 to 2% in., inclusive, and on 105 000 psi for sizes over 2% to 4 in., inclusive.
No @ Based on 130 000 psi for sizes 14 to 21% in., inclusive, and on 115 000 psi for sizes over 21% to 4 in., inclusive. .
